comment._content:
it would be more fun to see these images right next to each other in the stream

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content:
BigBean,

Thanks for pointing this out.  We moved the images so they are next to each other in the Ansel Adams set.  I'm not sure if there's a way to change their positioning in the photostream, though.  I think that's simply based on the order they were uploaded.  We'll look into it.

- Jill (U.S. National Archives)
